name: Celia's Lightmare
description:
Celia's Lightmare

We had the opportunity to work with a great group of people for LD 45 and created the following game!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Find the light, use it to fight. Find the wand and destroy nightmare fiends in this third person arena shooter.

Sacrifice your souls to gain multipliers each run, and see how long you can last in the Lightmare.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

[PLAY WITH SOUND!!]

  • Movement - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Fire - Left Click
  • Sacrifice souls and reset (when prompted) - F
  • Exit - ESC
